Articles.Content:
Sure would be nice to be able to run KSP in native resolution (2560x1600) for my monitor. With the UI scaling option(s), things have gotten better. Setting those to 150% makes the game just painful for my 64-year-old eyes at native resolution instead of unplayable. Sure would be nice if the UI scaling could go to 200% instead of maxing out at 150. I've been running KSP at 1280x800, which seems like a throwback to days of yore. The 1.2 prerelease prompted me to check out resolution issues again. It seems sort of ok at 1920x1200 and 150% scaling, but I ought to get a lot sharper display running at native resolution.

The folk with 4k monitors probably have it worse, but not much advantage to me in getting one of those. 2560x1600 on a 30" monitor is already "retina" quality for my retinas. :-(
